sentences.sContent: In this article I will focus on data collected using a nominal scale of measurement and the inferential techniques appropriate for nominal data.
sentences.sContent_eng: In this article I will focus on data collected using a nominal scale of measurement and the inferential techniques appropriate for nominal data.
sentences.sCn: 在本文中，我将主要讨论通过使用测量的定类尺度收集的数据，以及适用于定类数据的推论技术。

sentences.sContent: There might be a market for inferential power like that, especially if it could be yoked to some of the autonomous semi-intelligent agents that are already buzzing around on the Internet.
sentences.sContent_eng: There might be a market for inferential power like that, especially if it could be yoked to some of the autonomous semi-intelligent agents that are already buzzing around on the Internet.
sentences.sCn: 如果像那样的话，推论力也可能有市场，尤其是如果它能跟一些在互联网上已经流传开的、自发的半智能力量结合在一起时更可能有市场。

synos.tran: 推理的；推论的；根据推理的

trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or derived from inference
